bio1: Hello, I a software engineer based in London with a passion for continuous learning, sailing, scuba diving, music, building software, and investing. At 17 years old I moved from Greece to the UK for studies. I first went to the University of Bradford where I completed my Foundation Studies. Then my undergraduate degree in Computer Science at Royal Holloway, University of London. Recently, I started working as an engineer at Fornova while simultaneously staying updated with the latest technological advancements.
bio2: I'm currently engaged in developing two applications using React, enhancing my understanding of algorithms, and preparing for the AWS certification exam.
bio3: In my leisure time, my activities vary by location; in the UK, I stay active with exercises, swimming, and cycling. Meanwhile, in Greece, you'll likely find me sailing, diving into the depths, or exploring the mountain trails.
